properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_PW , MEMBER_NM , MEMBER_EMAIL , ENROLL_DT, INTRO , VIOLATION_COUNT , MODIFY_DT , STATUS_CD ,GRADE_CD, BLOG_NO FROM MEMBER JOIN BLOG USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND STATUS_CD != 201 AND GRADE_CD != 101
